name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Financial benefit of Rs. 6000/- per year in three equal installments to all landholding farmers.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme supporting sustainable production in agriculture sector.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Timely and adequate credit to farmers to meet their cultivation needs.

name: Soil Health Card
description: Government provides Soil Health Cards to farmers with crop-wise nutrient recommendations.
